name: Head

<meta charset="UTF-8">

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/bootstrap.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/jquery/jquery-ui.css"/>

    <style>

func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[4], payload:msg.payload};

name: Filter Websocket
Publish device
Pause Device readings
Save config file

Archive Pulse
Single Archive Pulse

func: flow.get("device").archiveNow = 0;

name: Set input filename
func:
var deviceProps = flow.get('deviceProps');
return {topic: 'readFile', 'filename':deviceProps.configFile};

name: Read Modbus
CALC1:MARK1:X?
Parse Data

Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[3], payload:msg.payload};

name: Save stepper
Parse Stepper Command
Init flow Variables
Publish status
func: return {topic:'status',payload:true};

name: Check for scan in progress
CALC1:MARK1:x
CALC1:MARK1:X?
func:
msg.payload = "CALC1:MARK1:X?\n"
return msg;

name: Parse Data
Set device Setting value
Init Stepper for Scan
Move Motor
func:
var newMsg = {topic : 'setting', payload: {'attr': 'moveMotor', 'value':1}}
return newMsg;

name: ping Stepper
func:
var newMsg = {topic : 'ping', payload: true}
return newMsg;

name: Start Sweep
func:
msg.payload = "INIT:IMM:ALL
*WAI
CALC1:MARK1:Y?
"
return msg;

name: PullData
Check Stepper Location
Check Stepper Location out to Ping
Set Abort Scan flag
func: flow.get('device').scan.value = -1;

name: Save pull data
Add last Scan point
Start Scan Msg
func: return {topic:"scanInProgress",payload:true};

name: Route msg
func:
msg.topic = JSON.parse(msg.payload).payload.topic.split("/")[1];
return msg;

name: Prep MQTT
